Package com.zoomly.service

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
com.zoomly.service.UserService
public class UserService extends Object
UserService.java This class provides the business logic for user-related operations including user registration, authentication, and account management.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static UserService getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of UserService. If the instance doesn't exist, creates it.
      Returns:
      The singleton instance of UserService.

    • login

      public Optional<User> login(String email, String password)
      Attempts to log in a user with the provided email and password. If login is successful, sets the currentUser and returns the user.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the user.
      password - The password of the user.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the user if login is successful, or an empty Optional if login fails.

    • registerUser

      public User registerUser(String firstName, String lastName, String email, String password, String accountType)
      Registers a new user by validating the user details and adding the user to the database.
      Parameters:
      firstName - The first name of the user.
      lastName - The last name of the user.
      email - The email address of the user.
      password - The password of the user.
      accountType - The type of account the user is creating.
      Returns:
      The created User object.

    • getCurrentUser

      public User getCurrentUser()
      Returns the current logged-in user.
      Returns:
      The current user.

    • setCurrentUser

      public void setCurrentUser(User user)
      Sets the current user.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to set as the current user.

    • getUserDao

      public UserDao getUserDao()
      Returns the UserDao instance used to interact with the database.
      Returns:
      The UserDao instance.

    • updateEmail

      public void updateEmail(int userId, String newEmail)
      Updates the email address of a user in the database.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to update.
      newEmail - The new email address for the user.

    • updateFirstName

      public void updateFirstName(int userId, String newFirstName)
      Updates the first name of a user in the database.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to update.
      newFirstName - The new first name for the user.

    • updateLastName

      public void updateLastName(int userId, String newLastName)
      Updates the last name of a user in the database.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to update.
      newLastName - The new last name for the user.

    • updatePassword

      public void updatePassword(int userId, String newPassword)
      Updates the password of a user in the database.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to update.
      newPassword - The new password for the user.

    • updateUser

      public void updateUser(User user)
      Updates all user details (email, first name, last name, password, account type) in the database.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object containing the updated details.

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser(int userId)
      Deletes a user from the database. If the deleted user is the current user, it clears the current user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to delete.

    • isEmailRegistered

      public boolean isEmailRegistered(String email)
      Checks if a given email is already registered in the database.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address to check.
      Returns:
      True if the email is registered, false otherwise.

    • getAllUsers

      public List<User> getAllUsers()
      Returns a list of all users in the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all users.
